name: Mycelius (Pheasatra)
description:
After a colossal space battle you've crash landed on the dreaded fungal planet, you managed to land very close to an ancient base with a ship nestled inside, however to reach it you'll have to face the local ecosystem, which harbors the most hostile wildlife ever documented.

Drive your last functional mech across the terrain as fast as you can while avoiding the ire of pretty much anything that moves.

The mech's weapon is damaged and will hurt you when you fire it, since you have limited heath you will have to use it sparingly while also not getting eaten.

Controls

Attack: Left Mouse (Fire lightning to mouse position)

Grab Object: Right Mouse (Grabs ground and enemies)

(Grabber / Attacker Limbs will aim at the mouse)

Up:  (W) or (Up) key

Down:  (S) or (Down) key

Right:  (D) or (Right) key

Left:  (A) or (Left) key

Pause Menu (ESC) key

(Note: The spider is procedurally animated, sometimes if the legs lock wrong it can get stuck, spamming the WASD keys does the trick most of the time, otherwise you can reset from the pause menu)

Made in 9 days for Juice Jam II

Theme : Paying the Price (Firing your weapon damages you)
